author: Rebecca Klar
title: Ethiopia declares state of emergency due to coronavirus
description: Ethiopia declared a state of emergency on Wednesday over the coronavirus pandemic. Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed Ali announced the decision on Twitter....
content:
Ethiopia declared a state of emergency on Wednesday over the coronavirus pandemic. 
Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed Ali announced the decision on Twitter. 
Considering the gravity of the #COVID19, the Government of Ethiopia has enacted a State of Emergency accord… [+741 chars]
